title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 245.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 245.2 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) The general
definitions of Part 200 of this Title apply to this part unless they are
inconsistent with the specific definitions in subdivision (b) of this
section. (b) For the purposes of
this part, the following specific definitions apply: (1)
'Administrator.' Means the same as
'Administrator' in
40
CFR
97.602
(see Table 1, section 200.9 of
this title). (2)
'Allocate or

Allocation.' The determination by the department, in accordance with this part, of the amount of CSAPR SO
2

Group 1 allowances to be
initially credited, at no cost to the recipient, to: (i) A CSAPR SO
2

Group
1 unit; (ii)
A new unit
set-aside; (iii)

Energy Efficiency
and Renewable Energy Technology (EERET) Account; or
(iv)

An entity not listed in subparagraphs
(i) through (iii) of this definition; (v) a CSAPR SO
2

Group
1 unit qualifying for an initial credit, provided that, if the department
initially credits zero CSAPR SO
2

Group 1 allowances, the
CSAPR SO
2

Group 1 unit will be treated as being
allocated an amount (i.e., zero) of CSAPR SO
2

Group 1
allowances. (3)
'Compliance account.' Means the same as 'compliance account' in
40
CFR
97.602
(see Table 1, section 200.9 of
this title). (4)
'Control period.'
Means the same as 'control period' in
40
CFR
97.602
(see Table 1, section 200.9 of
this title). (5)
'CSAPR'. Cross-State Air Pollution Rule. (6)
'CSAPR SO
2

Group 1 allowance.' Means the same as 'CSAPR
SO
2

Group 1 allowance' in
40
CFR
97.602
(see Table 1, section 200.9 of
this title). (7)
CSAPR
SO
2

Group 1 source.' Means the same as 'CSAPR
SO
2

Group 1 source' in
40
CFR
97.602
(see Table 1, section 200.9 of
this title). (8)
'CSAPR
SO
2

Group 1 Trading Program.' Means the same as 'CSAPR
SO
2

Group 1 Trading Program' in
40
CFR
97.602
(see Table 1, section 200.9 of
this title). (9)
'CSAPR
SO
2

Group 1 unit.' Means the same as 'CSAPR
SO
2

Group 1 unit' in
40
CFR
97.602
(see Table 1, section 200.9 of
this title). (10)
'Designated
representative.' Means the same as 'designated representative' in
40
CFR
97.602
(see Table 1, section 200.9 of
this title). (11)
'Emissions.'
Means the same as 'emissions' in
40
CFR
97.602
(see Table 1, section 200.9 of
this title). (12)
'EERET Account.'
A general account that may be opened by the New York State Energy Research and

Development Authority (NYSERDA) from which allowances may be sold or
distributed in order to provide funds to be used to support programs that
encourage and foster energy efficiency measures and renewable energy
technologies and cover the reasonable costs associated with the administration
and evaluation of these programs by NYSERDA. (13)
'General Account.' Means the same as
'general account' in
40
CFR
97.602
(see Table 1, section 200.9 of
this title). (14)
'Indian country.'
Means the same as 'Indian country' in
40
CFR
97.602
(see Table 1, section 200.9 of
this title). (15)
'Receive or
receipt of.' Means the same as 'receive or receipt of' in
40
CFR
97.602
(see Table 1, section 200.9 of
this title). (16)
'Source.' Means
the same as 'source' in
40
CFR
97.602
(see Table 1, section 200.9 of
this title). (17)
'Submit or
serve.' Means the same as 'submit or serve' in
40
CFR
97.602
(see Table 1, section 200.9 of
this title). (18)
'Unit.' Means the
same as 'unit' in
40
CFR
97.602
(see Table 1, section 200.9 of
this title). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
245.2

Adopted

New

York State Register December 2, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 48, eff. 12/12/2015

Adopted

New

York State Register December 19, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 51, eff. 1/2/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
